    • See Event in Other Timezones ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} date <- lubridate::ymd_hms("2020-04-02 21:00:00", tz = "Europe/Paris") lubridate::with_tz(date, "UTC") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "2020-04-02 19:00:00 UTC" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} lubridate::with_tz(date, "America/New_York") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "2020-04-02 15:00:00 EDT" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} lubridate::with_tz(date, "America/Los_Angeles") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "2020-04-02 12:00:00 PDT" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} lubridate::with_tz(date, "Australia/Sydney") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "2020-04-03 06:00:00 AEDT" ``` ::: :::
